tool_description: One interface to retrieve transactions across crypto exchanges and wallets. Create your own Coin Trackers, Portfolio Managers and more.
name: Path. Cryptocurrency.
title: Path. Cryptocurrency.

api_list.name: List Supported Sources
api_list.description: List all currently supported data sources where Path. may extract data information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://path-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "path-cryptocurrency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all Users
